cont.entity_a: Rough adjustment release lock is under the collar lock and difficult to adjust. Fine adjustment sticks, and the body does not slide smoothly in the collar. Very prone to becoming hard to adjust vertically due to wood dust accumulation. Retainer snap ring on the vertical adjustment shaft has broken twice due to pressure during adjustment.
Router is capable of producing 2.25 HP of mechanical energy while consuming 1.93 HP of electrical energy.
Powerful and quiet, with a versatile design.

Feature.comm: Soft start and variable speed are appreciated features.

cont.entity_a: Soft start feature is softer than older models. Variable speed is beneficial for different size bits and types of wood.
Fits perfectly on the router table base.
Router works well for making door fronts and other woodworking projects.
Generally lasts a year for trade use, but recent units only last a few months.
Good build quality, but box was previously opened and some parts were missing.
Router has less vibration and is more controllable than older models.

cont.entity_b: Serious incompatibility problems with some devices, including PlayStation 3 and HTC tytn. Connection issues with some laptops, requiring a return. Router worked well initially but developed problems after about a year. Defective unit with high drop rate returned for a refund.
Good range with MIMO technology, even with channel bonding turned off. Excellent range, does not drop signals, and is fast.
Router drops wireless connection intermittently. Router requires frequent resets to maintain wireless connectivity.
High speed and range with upgraded firmware. Great wireless range and speed with firmware update.
